title: It's amazing how 4 years into the game Nasus still doesn't get Q reduction if he dies
body:
Nothing else needs to be said

We all know this champion is the epitome of cancer

Impossible to remove from lane

Impossible to harass

Impossible to stop from reaching late game

Impossible to pressure elsewhere to prevent him from growing

Immune to harass, immune to ganks, immune to split pushing, immune to everything

Same build path every game, same playstyle every game, every tier from Bronze V to Challenger I

I've never once met a Nasus that was any good, because they're all equally bad

I've never once played against a Nasus and gotten any joy from killing him, or ever once felt like he outplayed me when he killed me

It's the biggest joke of League, and always will be

1/3 of his stacks lost on death, the only change that will ever remove this trash from existence
